content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 2, Granada CF 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 2, Granada CF 0.
Own Goal by Borja Gómez, Granada CF.  Barcelona 2, Granada CF 0.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Toño.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Pedro.

Goal!  Barcelona 1, Granada CF 0. Xavi (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner.
